title: Between 1 October 2017 and 30 September 2018, will an armed group from Yemen engage in a campaign that systematically kills 1,000 or more civilians in Yemen?
preds:
no way with KSA
missed that

The lads appear to have got their second wind, what with one thing and another, and may stop relying on other countries' troops to kill Yemenis.  This entire situation is extraordinarily depressing.  I don't suppose that is a helpful observation.
Based on general news and GJP consensus.
Based on general news and GJP consensus.
Based on general news and GJP consensus.

This conflict is far from being resolved as the outside forces feeding it are not ready to quit supplying the resources which keep it going.   Worse yet are the numbers of civilians who will die because of a lack of functioning institutions such are health care, food distribution and basic civil safety.
